mapper.insert: insert into umversion (VERSIONID, VERSION, VERSIONAME, SYSTEMCODE, CREATEDATE, SYSTEMNAME, MEMO) values (#{versionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versioname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{systemname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update umversion set VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSIONAME = #{versioname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEMCODE = #{systemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYSTEMNAME = #{systemname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where VERSIONID = #{versionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select VERSIONID, VERSION, VERSIONAME, SYSTEMCODE, CREATEDATE, SYSTEMNAME, MEMO from umversion
